thread.title: Cute kids interrupt dad’s live BBC interview in this amazing video
thread.title_full: Cute kids interrupt dad’s live BBC interview in this amazing video

author: Todd Haselton
title: Cute kids interrupt dad’s live BBC interview in this amazing video
text:
I don’t have kids but I work from home and I’m constantly worried something is going to appear in the background during a video call. If you’re like me, and have kids, then you’ll get a great chuckle out of this video. It features Professor Robert Kelly during an interview with BBC news and, presumably, his kids.
During the live broadcast, a kid strolls right into his dad’s office for some playtime. Dad’s on the computer, though, and tries to brush the little one away. Then the funniest moment happens – a little baby wheels him or herself right into the room, mother (or nanny?) hot on the heels.
It’s worth a watch, enjoy the quick chuckle.
